subject: Delegation of powers for matters pertaining Highway Administration to Regional Officers of NHAI.
text: HRdl <rfy <HT giferarrut TH19 / Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Tsw5 4Rae7t & RTTf TFY) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 3ft-5 Ta 6, 4dzr-10, ETrAT, 7$f f&ocft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Highway Administration /2020 No.7.5.3/2020, Dated the 3rd November, 2020 [Decision Taken on File No. NHAI/HO/OHT/Interim Policy/2020 E-File No. 39539] Sub.: Delegation of Powers for matters pertaining Highway Administration to Regional Officers of NHAI. In continuation of Policy Guidelines No. 7.5.2/2020 dated 16.03.2020, it has been decided that henceforth, ROs shall the permissions to PGCIL cases also. A one time processing fee of Rs. 5.0 lakh shall be charged on PGCIL cases. (It may also be noted that PGCIL vide Circular dt; 22.09.2020 (copy enclosed) restricted their supervision charges to 2.5% where ever shifting of their lines is carried out by the executing agency under the supervision of PGCIL). Encl.: As above. 3 If| 2 22 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) All officers at NHAI HQROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices Copy to:- AlI Members/CVO PS to Chairman Hindi Division- for translation in Hindi MT 7 & % NHAL grant
